PRI1.info: PRI1 alias is a Primary Tier collection of Feeds from the most reputable blocklist providers.-LB-False positives should be minimal due to feed maintainers responsiveness.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
PRI1.description: PRI1 - Collection of Feeds from the most reputable blocklist providers. (Primary tier)

PRI2.info: PRI2 alias is a collection of Feeds from Secondary Tier providers.-LB-Low False positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
PRI2.description: PRI2 - Collection of Feeds from Secondary Tier providers.

PRI3.info: PRI3 alias is a collection of Feeds from Tertiary Tier providers.-LB-May contain some False positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
PRI3.description: PRI3 - Collection of Feeds from Tertiary Tier providers.

feeds.info: Replace '_API_KEY_' with 'USER:PASS' in the URL after Registration (Replace @ to %40). https://faf.bambenekconsulting.com/feeds/license.txt
An alternative Alias exists below for individual BlockList DE Feeds

PRI4.info: PRI4 alias is a collection of Feeds from Fourth Tier providers.-LB-May contain some False positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
PRI4.description: PRI4 - Collection of Feeds from Fourth Tier providers.

feeds.info: The final URL for this feed will be provided upon registration.

PRI5.info: PRI5 alias is a collection of Feeds from Fifth Tier providers.-LB-May contain some False positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
PRI5.description: PRI5 - Collection of Feeds from Fifth Tier providers.

SCANNERS.info: These are feeds that scan the Internet for exposed services

feeds.feed: Internet Storm Center - Errata Security Masscan

SFS.info: SFS alias is a feed from Stop Forum Spam.-LB-This is an aggressive feed which is typically used to protect webservers etc.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once every 8 hours. (3x / Day)

TOR.info: TOR is a collection of Feeds for the TOR network (EN = exit nodes, All = exit nodes + relays).-LB-Do not enable this feed if you utilize the TOR service as it will break connectivity.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
TOR.description: TOR - Collection of Feeds for the TOR network.

MAIL.info: MAIL is a collection of Feeds for Mail Server specific blocklists.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
MAIL.description: MAIL - Collection of Feeds for Mail Server specific blocklists.

feeds.info: This is a very large Feed (~1.3M lines). To utilize, increase the pfSense 'Firewall Maximum Table entries' limit to 3-4M.

DNS_4.info: A list of Public DNS servers.

Internic_4.info: Internic is a list of the 13 IPv4 Root DNS servers via Internic Domain Registration service.-LB-Typically used for a Permit Outbound usage.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per week.
Internic_4.description: Internic - List of the 13 IPv4 Root DNS servers via Internic Domain Registration service.

Proxy_IP.info: A list of free, public, forward proxy servers.

VPN_4.info: A list of common VPN providers

BlockListDE.info: BlockList.DE is a fail2ban reporting service.-LB-The 'PRI3 Alias' contains a single URL for all BlockList.DE feeds.-LB-This BlockList.DE Alias can be utilized to enable specific BlockList.DE Feeds, as desired.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
BlockListDE.description: Collection of specific fail2ban reporting service Feeds.

PRI1_6.info: PRI1_6 alias is a Primary Tier collection of IPv6 Feeds.-LB-May contain some False positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per hour.
PRI1_6.description: PRI1_6 - collection of IPv6 Feeds from the most reputable blocklist providers.

SFS_6.info: SFS alias is a feed from Stop Forum Spam.-LB-This is an aggressive feed which is typically used to protect webservers etc.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once every 12 hours. (2x / Day)

DNS_6.info: A list of Public DNS servers.

Internic_6.info: Internic is a list of the 13 IPv6 Root DNS servers via Internic Domain Registration service.-LB-Typically used for a Permit Outbound usage.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per week.
Internic_6.description: Internic - List of the 13 IPv6 Root DNS servers via Internic Domain Registration service.

VPN_6.info: A list of common VPN providers

EasyList.info: EasyList are Feeds originaly designed for filering on browser based extensions. The DNSBL parser will only utilize those domains which are listed to be blocked in full
EasyList.description: EasyList Feeds - Utilizing only the domains which are listed to be blocked in full.

ADs.info: ADs group is a collection of ADvertisement Domain Feeds.-LB-Some sites may become slow or unresponsive. Whitelist Domains as required.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
ADs.description: ADs - Collection of ADvertisement Domain Feeds.

Email.info: List of email providers. If not filtered by 'TOP1M Whitelist' may block many websites.
Email.description: Email - List of email providers domains.

Malicious.info: Malicious group is a collection of Malicious Domain Feeds.-LB-May contain false positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
Malicious.description: Malicious - Collection of Malicious Domain Feeds.

Phishing.info: Phishing group is a collection of Phishing Domain Feeds.-LB-These phising domains are based on full URLs, so there may be some False Positives.-LB-Its recommended to use the TOP1M whitelist.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
Phishing.description: Phishing - Collection of Phishing Domain Feeds.

feeds.info: Replace '_API_KEY_' with 'USER:PASS' in the URL after Registration (Replace @ to %40). https://faf.bambenekconsulting.com/feeds/license.txt

alternate.info: Register for an API key to download more frequently.

BBcan177.info: BBcan177 is a Domain feed as provided by BBcan177.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
BBcan177.description: BBcan177 - Feed as provided by BBcan177.

STUN.info: A list of public STUN servers.

BBC.info: BBC is a DGA type feed of malicious domains (3 day window).-LB-This is a large feed (~400k Domains / [Agr: ~800k] ).
BBC.description: BBC - DGA type feed of malicious domains (3 day window).

feeds.info: Replace '_API_KEY_' with 'USER:PASS' in the URL after Registration (Replace @ to %40). https://faf.bambenekconsulting.com/feeds/license.txt

Malicious2.info: Malicious2 group is a second tier collection of Malicious Domain Feeds.-LB-May contain false positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
Malicious2.description: Malicious2 - Collection of Feeds from Secondary Tier providers.

feeds.info: Note: This feed is United Kingdom centric, and can cause False Positives for other Country users!
This is a large feed ~480k lines

Cryptojackers.info: Cryptojackers group is a collection of Malicious Domain crypto mining Feeds.-LB-May contain false positives.-LB-The frequency of updates is set to once per day.
Cryptojackers.description: Cryptojackers - Collection of Malicious Domain crypto mining Feeds

feeds.info: This feed is also contained in the CoinbBlocker Feed

Compilation.info: Compilation group is a collection of feeds containing data from a group of other feeds.
Compilation.description: Compilation - feeds that aggregate other feeds

feeds.info: Ads, (Mobile) App Ads, Phishing, Malvertising, Malware, Spyware, Ransomware, CryptoJacking, Scam, Telemetry, Analytics, Tracking (Where not needed for proper functionality).
Generated every 6 hours from PhishTank, OpenPhish, Cert.pl and PhishFindR reports. Each domain is analyzed to eliminate false positives, through the Whitelist of Anudeep and the Alexa Rank.
